athenahealth creates innovative healthcare technology that connects clinicians, patients, payers, and partners in differentiated ways. Our electronic health records, revenue cycle management, and patient engagement tools allow anytime, anywhere access, driving better financial outcomes for our customers and enabling our provider customers to deliver better quality care. In everything we do, we’re inspired by our vision to create a thriving ecosystem that delivers accessible, high-quality, and sustainable healthcare for all. We are seeking an API Product Manager who is passionate about the possibilities that can be unlocked by using standards-based data exchange to truly change the game. You not only know what the acronym FHIR stands for, but you also understand the transformational potential of it for healthcare! You will be a central figure in influencing API Strategy and leading our teams to design API frameworks, tools and patterns to further solidify athena’s place as a key player for interoperability across the US health care ecosystem. Position is in our headquarters in Watertown, MA (near Boston). Position may be converted to Senior PM based on candidate’s experience.

see https://athenahealth.wd1.myworkdayjobs.com/External/job/Watertown-MA/Product-Manager---API_R4621
